channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Perfect pavement

item.title: Gainax Has Filed For Bankruptcy After 40 Years Of Operation
item.description: Gainax, the studio behind anime series such as 'Neon Genesis Evangelion', has filed for bankruptcy after 40 years of operation.

item.title: Practical empathy (vs. telepathy)

item.title: 12 Questions To Know If You Have ‘Anger Issues’—By A Psychologist
item.description: Do you struggle to keep your cool when the going gets tough? These research-backed questions can help you find the answer.
